attributes.action: The Prime Minister must immediately inform the EU that Britain will leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: There is a serious risk of economic and social unrest escalating into chaos and even collapse if the Prime Minister and the goverment do not act immediately on the Brexit referendum by triggering Article 50 without further delay
attributes.background: The Pime Minister is delaying in triggering Article 50. A campaign has started seeking a second referendum. The will of the British people was clearly expressed in the Brexit referendum. Delay in triggering Article 50 could lead to serious social unrest to the detrement of the country.
